entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Islet

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
